Description: Coordination Meeting Records - Weekly Terminal coordination meetings over 24-30 month construction
Notes: Allowance for ~100-130 weekly meetings at $600-750/meeting (admin staff prep review distribution filing)

Description: Interface Agreements - FSPL-TI interface agreement preparation and negotiation
Notes: Allowance for major interface agreement with Terminal operations; includes negotiations documentation coordination

Description: Interface Agreements - Metro Vancouver utilities interface agreement
Notes: Allowance for utility interface agreement including sewer water coordination

Description: Interface Agreements - Other utilities and rail interface agreements
Notes: Allowance for remaining interface agreements (BC Hydro FortisBC rail authority telecommunications)

Description: Marine Coordination Records - Notices to mariners and port/marine authority coordination
Notes: Allowance for marine coordination over 8-12 month marine works period; includes NTM preparation VFPA coordination vessel scheduling

Description: Security Compliance Records - CBSA/TC security compliance documentation
Notes: Allowance for security compliance over 24-30 month construction in port security zone; includes TWIC/MSIC coordination background checks access management

Description: Trenchless Crossing Monitoring Reports - Settlement and condition monitoring for HDD crossings
Notes: Allowance for 2-4 trenchless crossings; survey instrumentation monitoring and reporting over installation period

Description: Trenchless Crossing Monitoring Coordination - Coordination and stakeholder reporting
Notes: Allowance for coordination with utility owners railway stakeholder reporting

Description: Engineering Oversight Allocation - technical oversight for monitoring and interface activities
Notes: Additional engineering review and oversight allocation for technical coordination activities
EPCM project management overhead allocation for coordination package

Description: QA/QC Coordination Oversight - quality oversight of coordination and interface activities
Notes: 18% of notional coordination base ($200k); QA/QC oversight of interface management and records
2% of third-party monitoring services; procurement coordination for monitoring contracts
